content: a quick and simple knitting project for gifting or for yourself tip when you complete the first section weigh the bit of scarf you have completed this will take away some of the guess work and give you an approximation of how much yarn you need to complete the decrease section other yarn weights the same pattern can be easily used for other yarn weights work the same as for sock weight yarn just replace the 45 sts in the increase section with your desired number of stitches for worsted weight yarn 33 to 35 stitches works well for bulky weight yarns recommend anywhere from 25 to 29 there should always be an odd number of stitches
